name: Terrarium
description:
Play as a scientific and study different insect species in this systemic god game. Experiment to learn insects behavior. Observe what's happening, and try to keep a balance in this ecosystem!

This game was made in 6 weeks, as a school project, by 6 game designers students, which all were "specialized" in one role:

Project Management: Michel Bigourd

3D art: Hugo Kihl

FX, sound design: Arno Comte

Game design: Rémi Salomon and Victor Jaffeux

Programming: Mathieu Bouchonnet
